channel.title: Homes on Ruiming Cao's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Ruiming Cao's Site

item.description: I’m a second-year graduate student in computer science at University of California, Los Angeles. I’m working on computer-aided diagnosis for prostate cancer in Magnetic Resonance Research Labs, Radiology, supervised by Prof. Kyung Hyun Sung. I graduated with B.S. in computer science and in applied mathematics at UCLA in 2017. In college, I worked on knowledge graph parsing/explainable AI supervised by Prof. Song-Chun Zhu. My current research interests are medical imaging, computer vision, and MRI.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I was a teaching assistant for the following courses at UCLA: Fall 2017 CS174A: Introduction to Computer Graphics Winter 2018 CS32: Introduction to Computer Science II - slides(pdf) Spring 2018 CS32: Introduction to Computer Science II - slides(pdf)
